nodes.bodyText: There is no volatile keyword on the combinedChainDataClient, which is inconsistent with the other fields, is that intentional?

Good spot.  Kind of annoying that we need volatile there and would be good to refactor so everything is created by a builder and injected to the constructor, but would have to separate construction from starting properly across all those classes first.
do we want a LOG.debug here?
Done, though I don't really know why we have all those debug statements... Probably should make them all trace or get rid of them at some point.
Wound up changing both so we have noDuties and withDuties.
